content: When a fish bites, reel it in quick. Don't give it a chance to struggle, hoho~! Mo rush. Once you've caught some fish, you can place them in the <style=Highlight>Eco-Tank</style>.

content: {A抱歉}Based on my observations, the <style=Highlight>Eco-Tank</style> can house several species of <style=Highlight>insects</style>. If you need anything, just come find me back at the Camp, hoho~!
